original_title: Timothy Wright: Live in New York
overview: Gospel singer Timothy Wright performs his inspiring music live in New York. Featured tracks include "United We Stand," "There's A Blessing" (featuring Dottie Peoples), "We Will Wait," "Due Time," "Grateful," "Holy Spirit, Have Your Way," "For the Rest of My Life (I'll Serve Him)," "My Desire," "I Know a Man" and many more. Also includes rehearsal footage and interviews.
title: Timothy Wright: Live in New York
